text: SMASH INTO: A 90's college party in full swing. We find F BLACK GIRLS pushing and shoving their way to the dance fl

That no matter where you are or what you’re doing, pulls you out your seat. That was me and my crew: The Flossy Posse. The Flossy Posse tear it down with dance that’s all their own. No guys. Just them. PARTY-GOERS stare and point, but these girls don’t give a shit.
I know. Trust me: what you swore was fly back in the day probably wasn’t either. But those were -- and still are -- my girls, thinking we were the baddest chicks in the game...
Graduation Day. Our girls take photos in their caps and gowns, which have been bedazzled with ‘FLOSSY POSSE’ logo
Definitely the baddest chicks at Spelman. After college, we were with each other through everything.
SASHA shows off her byline on the cover of Time Magazine. other ladies toast.
Successes...  Official White 6-15-16 2. INT. PLANNED PARENTHOOD - DAY —- FLASHBACK 4 Sasha, Ryan and Lisa sit in the waiting room -- ominous S posters are on the wall.
Mistakes... Dina bursts out of the door of the doctor’s office giddy, arms in the air, signalling victory.
It’s chlamydia! I got the shit you can cure! They all cheer.
RYAN, gorgeous in her wedding gown, says her vows to STEW in a story-book perfect wedding ceremony.

Weddings... The girls wear bridesmaids gowns and necklaces shaped lik “FP.” They all dab their eyes as Ryan and Stewart kiss. EXT. LISA’S HOUSE - DAY - FLASHBACK 6 Lisa's baby shower. The Flossy Posse watch a very pregnan Lisa opens gifts. Her man looks disinterested as he drink beer in the background. Lisa clocks it, but plays it off.
Babies...
The ladies wait, somber. Lisa exits the courtroom, wiping away tears. They embrace her and walk out.
Divorces... We were ride or die.
The Flossy Posse at Essence Fest over the years with a Ch indicating each passing year.  10 Official White 6-15-16 3.

But sometimes, words go unsaid. Disagreements go unresolved. You still talk on the phone, keep up on social media, but a year goes by where you don’t see each other. That year turns into five. Life doesn’t feel right without them. And that’s when you realize the Flossy Posse needs to ride again. We end on the last Essence photo, dated 2012 and CUT TO:
RYAN PIERCE, 30s, beautiful, poised, and perfectly put together, strikes poses as a Photographer snaps pictures a FEMALE PRINT REPORTER interviews her.
Relationships take work. Our biggest challenge as women is finding the balance of marriage, career, kids, life in general --
I agree!

We’re told we have to choose between the personal and the professional. But I never believed that. I control my own destiny. I am strong, I am powerful, I am beautiful. If I will it, I can have it all.
And it appears you do. Reveal Ryan’s handsome husband STEWART PIERCE, 30s, her e in every way. He steps in with a loving embrace for his w
A DJ is in mid-interview with Ryan and Stewart.
Stewart, how does a former all-pro tight-end link up with the second coming of Oprah?  11 Official White 6-15-16
Ryan’s strength has always been making others their best selves. I knew I needed that in my life. (looking at her) So, I pursued her and I got lucky.
He sure did. Everyone laughs. She looks at him with love.
No. I’d say we both did.
A national news show -- Ryan and Stewart are being interviewed by TAMRON HALL.
So Ryan, how did he propose?
With barbecue.
(surprised) Excuse me?
It was this little hole in the wall spot off campus with some serious pulled pork. Our favorite spot when we didn’t have any money.
He told me he didn’t know where his football career would take him, but that it wouldn’t mean anything if I wasn’t along for the ride.
Wow. Tell us -- what is the secret to making this marriage work?
That's easy. I married my best friend. Ryan is my equal. My partner. 11  12 Official White 6-15-16

He told me -- and I'll never forget -- he wanted me to soar as high as I could. On Tamron’s face, swooning as she gestures to their book: “You Can Have It All”. A photo of Stewart kissing Ryan’s cheek is the cover.

And soar you have. A best-selling author for the second time. Now for our viewers at home, you can purchase Ryan’s latest New York Times best seller, “You Can Have It All,” online or catch them on tour-- what’s your next stop?
New Orleans. We’ll be signing copies down at Essence Fest.
And Ryan will be giving this year’s keynote address. That alone is worth the trip. Guaranteed17
Speaking of having it all -- when are you two starting a family? You’d make such beautiful babies and be fantastic parents.
Trust me, Tamron, it’s on the agenda. Ryan smiles at Stewart. He winks back. It’s adorable.

We're on Ryan and Stewart’s smiling faces on a flat scree Journalism awards adorn the walls. Reveal SASHA FRANKLIN, 30's, whip smart and in charge. Her desk is covered in pa 12 due bills. She watches the Ryan and Stewart interview on laptop and TMZ on another, phone to her ear.

You don’t have anything for me? Not even some Nicki Minaj or Kardashian foolishness?  Official White 6-15-16 6. Another PHONE rings. She knocks over the framed photo of holding up her Time Magazine cover as she reaches for it.
I’1l1 call you back. (then; into second phone) Bill, hey... I know why you’re calling. She puts the call on speaker.

We're pulling our ads unless you up your views, Sasha. On her laptop we see her blog -- SASHA’S SECRETS. A headl reading STEVE HARVEY -- ILLITERATE OR JUST IGNORANT? is a a PHOTO of STEVE HARVEY looking confounded as he reads hi note cards at the Miss USA pageant. She scrolls through the site as we see gossip tidbits abo black celebs, none of them flattering.
I have it on the DL that Drake is smashing Oprah. It’s not something that I can publish right now... Sasha knows she’s bullshitting and so does the Ad Rep.
Unless you have proof -- we can’t spend any more money on a dying gossip blog, Sasha.
I can’t invent scandal, but I’m going to Essence Fest this weekend. Someone’s bound to do something crazy.
Increase views by the end of the weekend or we pull out.
Come on, Bill. Don’t be premature! The line goes dead. Sasha hangs up, frustrated. Out the corner of her eye, she sees her BMW being hooked up to a truck outside.
No! No, no, no, no!!!  13 Official White 6-15-16 7.
An out of breath Sasha runs up to a gross, sweaty TOW TRU DRIVER, hooking up her car to his truck.
That’s my car!
Not anymore, bae bae.
Dude, come on, I need my car!
Yeah, I feel you, but the bank ‘needs’ their money. Sooo, you know. The Tow Truck Driver continues hooking up Sasha’s car. Sa is desperate.
What if we could work something out? You look like a man who appreciates a woman with curves.
Oh, I do... If you let me tie you up, strip you down, and then take a shit on your titties, I’m one hundred percent in.
(stunned) Who thinks that? Let alone says it. Fuck that, your nasty ass is out of control. I'll take Uber.
Suit your self. Good luck gettin your whip back, bae-bae. He hops in his truck. As he drives off, Sasha screams--
Wait, what if I whip out a titty? Will you settle for a titty?! Sasha watches, frustrated, as he pulls off with her car. YEAR-OLD BOY rides by on his bike, stopping.

Whatever you're selling? I’m buyin.  14 Official White 6-15-16 8. INT. TOTAL PAPER - TED’S OFFICE - DAY 14 DINA, 30s, hot tempered and always looking for a cause to fight (justified or not), sits across from her boss, TED, 50s, stern-faced and full of disappointment.
Dina, throwing staplers at co- workers is not only frowned upon here at Total Paper, it’s also illegal. It’s a form of assault.
That's why I aimed for his lower body and not his face.
Not the point. You're lucky Vikram decided not to press charges.
And he’s lucky I aimed low. So we're both lucky. All good.
(sighing) Dina, I’m going to have to let you go. For everyone’s safety. I hope you understand. Dina shrugs this off. She does not understand.
Totally. Won’t happen again. We’re all cool.
Dina, listen to me. We’re not all cool. I’m letting you go.
Okay, okay, I feel you, Big Ted. It’s water under the bridge. Gonna get back to work.
Dina. There’s no bridge and you should not get back to work. Now, please acknowledge you understand that you're fired.
Ted, I get it. You’re upset. I shouldn't thrown things in a... (MORE )
15 Official White 6-15-16 9.
(using air quotes) “place of work”.
Why are you making air quotes? This is a place of work. Dina stands.
Lesson learned. By the way? I’m going to Essence Fest with my girls this weekend. So I’m gonna need Friday off.
Dina, you can have all the days off. You're fired. As in you don’t have a job. Do you understand me?

Yep, see you bright and early Tuesday. So glad we did this, Ted. I feel like this is progress. Dina exits. A banged-up Vikram spots her in the hallway a runs in the other direction. Flustered, Ted calls after h
Dina! Don’t make me call security!
LISA COOPER, 30s, Type A, no nonsense, wearing nurse’s scrubs, reviews a very detailed list.
Here’s their schedule: bath time, snack time, homework time, ten minutes of TV, bed time. DELORES, 60s, watches Family Feud, barely listening to Li
Steve Harvey could get it on the Lord's day. While I was at church.
Mom! Focus!
Will you calm down?! I have raised kids before. (MORE )
Official White 6-15-16 10.
(then, re: Lisa) Although not without their issues.

You know what? Forget it. I’m staying. I can’t take a chance on them deviating from their bed time. Before Delores can protest in walks Dina, shades and Mard Gras beads on, blasting Lil Wayne from her phone.
How'd you get in here?
Fuck a locked door. You ready to get turnt?
I can’t go. There’s just too much going on --
Nope. Nope. Nope.
For once I agree with Dina. Delores calls out into the hallway.

Austin! Riley! Come say goodbye to your Mom! She’s going off to have fun so she won’t be so grouchy all the time. Lisa gives her mom a look as AUSTIN, 6, and RILEY, 4, run Lisa kneels down, pulls them into a tight, dramatic hug.
Do not let Meemaw let you stay up late. And do not forget how much I love you.
Bitch, you ain’t going off to war. Dina grabs Lisa’s bag and walks out. Lisa still hugs them
Go! I beg you! We'll be fine. Lisa reluctantly releases them, starts toward the door. D waits on the porch.  Official White 6-15-16 11.
Are you seriously wearing scrubs? You got on granny panties too? (looking at her feet) Oh, shit! Clogs?? Is that your new birth control?
Ryan and Stewart gather their belongings. Their agent, ELIZABETH DAVELLI, 40s, crude and ballsy as hell, walks i
As usual, you guys fucking killed it! And I’m not the only one who thought so...
Are you going to tell us who else thought so?
Jesus, you have no patience for dramatic revelations, do you? Fine. Bethany Marshall, the head of marketing at Calmart thought so! And... Ryan hangs on her words. Excited.
Just tell us!
They want to launch an exclusive “Ryan and Stewart” collection and underwrite a “Ryan and Stewart” talk show. Ryan screams, hugging Elizabeth.
Are you kidding me?
(stunned) That's -- amazing!
She said, and I quote, “They’re just so real.” She and her biz affairs team are flying down to New Orleans this weekend to make the (MORE )
Official White 6-15-16 12.
offer. They want to launch the line by the end of the year-- Ryan looks at Stewart, over the moon.
Stewart, this is --
-- Incredible! Everything we’ve talked about. He kisses her lovingly. Then checks his watch.
Damn -- better head out if I’m going to make my flight. I’1l catch you and the ladies later.
Yes, you will!
Bye, big guy. Elizabeth hugs Stewart. A little too long. It’s awkward, you can’t blame her. He exudes sexuality and manliness. As he goes, Elizabeth looks at Ryan.

Don’t hate me, but -- are you sure you still want to have a wild weekend with your girls, when so much is hanging on the line? Can't you just close the deal and take them to St. Bart’s next month? Buy them all Birkin bags?
Elizabeth, it’ll be fine -- we’re all adults. Our wild days are behind us. Most of us...

You’re sure? Because if I went to New Orleans for a weekend with my college friends, there'd be pictures of our tits all over the internet. If I’m being honest, there's a few of those already, but YOUR tits are best-selling author tits...  17 Official White 6-15-16 13.
What’s the title of my book, Elizabeth?
(rotely) “You Can Have It All”.
That’s right.
Fine -- I trust your judgement. And I can’t wait to meet “The Flossy Posse.” You guys are going to be keekee-ing all weekend. Girl, bye.

Liz -- and I say this out of love -- do yourself a favor this weekend and refrain from saying “sistas”, “bye, Felicia”, “ratchet” or any other urban colloquialisms you may think are appropriate. They’re not.

(beat) Wow. I’m not even offended. That’s why you are Ryan-fucking-Pierce and you're going to be RICH. Go have your hashtag Black Girl Magic weekend. PS. Which one’s Felicia? Ryan shakes her head, smiling, and walks out.
(calling after) Am I allowed to say “hello” to her?
Lisa and Dina sit at the gate as Lisa digs through her KNAPSACK.

I’ve got us covered for the plane ride: anti-nausea medication, hand- santizer, hazmat masks, earplugs. Only have one blanket though. You know how many germs are in an airline blanket? Dina frowns at her scrubs.  Official White 6-15-16
Aren’t nurses supposed to be sexy? Fishnets and cleavage and sponge baths and whatnot?
Yes, in porn. Not in the real world. This might be why you have trouble keeping a job.
I stay employed, Judge Judy. Lisa pops an anti-nausea pill and puts her mask in place.
You need to relax. I got some bomb ass cush if you wanna take a hit before we board. Shit will get you right.
Wait, how did you-- actually, nevermind, I don’t want to know.
Good, ‘cause I ain’t telling. But I'll give you a hint: where the sun don’t shine.
Definite pass then. You think there will be any drama with Ryan and Sasha. It’s been long enough, right?
Better be. I came here to get white girl wasted. I’m not letting any of you bitches kill my vibe. A smiling Ryan rolls up behind them.
Excuse me... can you ladies point me to the “Flossy Posse”?
Ryan! My nigga. Ryan gives Lisa and Dina big hugs.  Official White 6-15-16 15.
I’m so happy to see you two!!
Hey ladies! They all turn to see Sasha roll up, expensive outfit. The picture of confidence and success. Sasha hugs Lisa and Di full of love and excitement.
I’ve missed you guys! They pull apart. Sasha turns to Ryan. An awkward beat. Th they hug, the barely touching kind.
Look at you, girl! Life is treating you well.
Please. I see you and Stew pop up on my feed once a week going to some fabulous event. Lisa and Dina pick up on the “nice-nasty” vibe.
(sotto) This isn’t weird, right?
(sotto) Shiiit. These bitches plastic. Lisa pulls out four bedazzled Flossy Posse vests from her to break the tension.
Okay, check it out. I made these just for the occasion! The vests look like something old ladies in Atlantic City would wear to keep track of each other in the casino.
Bitch, I thought I told you to push that sewing machine off your roof.
What? They’re fashionable...
...in a Kanye sorta way, sure.  18 Official White 6-15-16 16.
How ‘bout we save them for the last night?
Or the flight home?
Or this recycle bin over here.
You know what? Y’all don’t deserve them... The girls laugh. Lisa pouts, puts the vests away. As they her in good fun.
Our ladies sit in first class, which is all black except a terrified ELDERLY WHITE COUPLE, 70's.
I don’t understand. I thought this was first class. Sasha, sits next to a masked and blanket covered Lisa spr her arms with insect repellent. Sasha gives her a look.
I'm just saying. We all have to be mindful. When that Zika swarm hits you want to prepared.
Don’t make me trade seats.
You want half my sandwich?
You still vegan?
Uh-huh.
Then no. A FLIGHT ATTENDANT tends to Ryan and Dina.  Ryan nods, Official White 6-15-16 17.
What can I get you, Ms Pierce?
Vodka tonic, splash of cranberry.
Oh shit, I see you Ryan! Getting the party started! This shit is free, right? embarrassed. Dina snaps her fingers, excited.
Heyyy. In that case, let me holler at three whiskey shots and a coke to chase that shit. Coke zero, though, I’m watching my figure. Actually, do you have Cherry Coke?
Ma’am, you know this flight is only an hour, right?
Oh, right. Good lookin’ out. So let me get those three shots now. Then hit me with a shot of Bailey’s when we reach our cruising altitude... The Flight Attendant scurries off.
And don’t forget my Cherry Coke!
Dina, can we turn it down a notch?

Girl, please. We about to descend on the Crescent City to celebrate Black womanhood in all its forms. From the elegant to the ratchet. (she gets up) Who here going to Essence fest?! Nearly all of the plane affirms.
We are not. Her husband, slightly deaf, is confused.  Official White 6-15-16 18.
Are we being hijacked?
Ladies, we ain’t turning down shit!! Am I right? The plane full of women affirms it. Sasha laughs. Dina’s crazy but that’s their girl.
Dina! Sit down! Dina grabs the tray of shots from the FLIGHT ATTENDANT
Ma’ am-—

It’s alright, girl. I got this. Get us some more Patron shots next. I got everyone in here. The Flight Attendant is miffed but goes back. Dina passes shots to Sasha, Lisa and the rest plane singing “I’m Ever Woman.” The rest of the plane joins in. Ryan exchanges smiles with Sasha and Lisa who sing and cl along. Sasha whips out her selfie stick.
Alright, ladies! On three... Sasha counts down as the girls lean in and snap their fir trip pic. Right then Lisa projectile vomits.
Told you to get that kush. A brass band version of Bill Withers’ “Lovely Day” drops kicking off a MONTAGE of photos and handheld video:
A plane lands.
The ladies rolling through the airport with their LUGGAGE Essence signage and a JAZZ BAND greet them.  21 22 23 24 Official White 6-15-16 19.
The Flossy Posse is back, N’Awlins! A LIMO DRIVER with an Ipad that says “FLOSSY POSSE” on it greets them as well.
The ladies ceremoniously enter the limo, like royalty, ac silly and having fun.
The ladies toast with champagne as they drive past the Superdome, heading downtown to the French Quarter.

Public drunkenness. Hurricanes and Hand Grenades in hand. Droves of fine-ass MEN and beautiful, shapely WOMEN in al shades of brown. Their limo pulls up and they hop out to join other revele dancing to the brass band that plays “Lovely Day”. The ladies strike a pose. Sasha snaps a picture and posts to social media, #EssenceFest #FlossyPosse #SashasSecrets Dina dry-humping a human statue who stays in character an doesn’t move. They wave to men on wrought-iron balconies who dangle bea Ryan listens to a sweet elderly man playing a washboard w spoons.

Sasha gets distracted from her social media trolling on h phone and looks up to see a Zip-Line strung up between balconies on opposite sides of the street. A White Frat G whoops and hollers as he soars above them.
Now that is some white boy shit right there. They need to keep that for Mardi Gras and let us have ours. Dina walks up with four HAND GRENADES.  Official White 6-15-16 20.
Four extra large hand grenades!
Dina, I asked for wine.
Bitch, I’ve seen you put grain alcohol in a Slurpee. Before noon.
For real. If G-string Daytona-Beach Lisa met Granny-Big-Draws Lisa --
Right? Girl, you used to shut clubs down back in college.
That was before two tiny humans ripped through my vagina and sucked the life from my tits. My ‘booty poppin on a handstand’ days are over.
How long’s it been since you got that back blew out? Lisa shrugs.
Two years, maybe? They all GASP, stunned.
Since Terrence?
Honestly, I don’t even think about it. I take a vigorous spin class, read some erotica and I manage.
This is unacceptable. You are getting some this weekend.
Straight up, you’re not leaving here without at least two dicks inside you.  Official White 6-15-16 21.
Okay, let’s not go crazy -- but as your therapist -- I prescribe penis. A group of women fans spot Ryan and rush up.
Can we take a picture with you?
Sure! They each get their autograph and selfie as the Flossy Po stands off to the side. Sasha is noticeably envious.
Damn, this shit gonna happen all weekend? It’s like travelling with Beyonce.
Aww, leave her alone. Ryan is doing her thing. Proud of her. Sasha grumbles as an email alert comes up on her phone. Subject: EXCLUSIVE SCOOP. Sasha opens it, excited, then -
The fuck --
What’s the matter -- ? (seeing the alert) Oh my God!
What y’all tripping about? (taking a look) Ahhh hell naw -- On Sasha’s phone: a photo of STEWART KISSING ANOTHER WOMA
That can’t be -- Sasha enlarges the photo. It’s undeniably Stewart.
I’ma Beat. This. Nigga’s. ASS!  Official White 6-15-16 22.
That's definitely Stewart’s punk ass. And that is definitely NOT Ryan he’s tonguing down.
Oh my God, poor Ryan --
Where'd you get this?!

(recognizing her) Simone. No last name. Some Instagram ho. I heard she sucked off A-Rod in a bathroom stall once. Sasha shows Simone’s latest Instagram photos. SIMONE, 20s Amber Rose-salacious and sexy.
I hate her! But damn -- look at that ass! Is that real? You don’t get that with just squats, do you?
Your ass-envy is about on my last nerve.
Oh shit -- the bitch is here! The photos are tagged at Essence Fest.
Eat a Dick Simone is here?
We have to tell Ryan.
Sasha, go handle that.
Why do I have to be the one?
It’s your picture, ho!  25 Official White 6-15-16 23. The women look over at Ryan who poses with some little gi

Agreed.
Fuck that. Do it like a Brazilian wax. It'll sting, shock and maybe make her scream, but it’1l be better than waterboarding the bitch.
No. Wait until we get to the room.
(walking up) Wooo. Oh my God. I forgot how hot it is here. Please tell me y’all ready to head to the hotel? Sasha stashes her phone. Lisa gives Dina “not now” eyes.
Sure/Yeah/Let’s go. EXT. BOURBON STREET —- DAY - MOMENTS LATER 25 Ryan is all smiles as they walk Bourbon Street linking ar with Sasha and Lisa who look like deer in headlights. Din intense.
We've got a great suite at The Monteleone, VIP passes to all the parties, great seats at the Superdome for New Edition, Maxwell, Babyface... and we are going to EAT! Damn the calories.
Yup/Sounds great/Be some happy, fat bitches...

what a girls trip is all about: staying up late, drinking and making memories that we can laugh about the rest of our lives.
Yolo!/Amen/Might kill somebody.
(did she hear correctly?) And gossip! I want to catch up on everything you three haven’t been sharing on the phone. No secrets. want all the dirt--! Dina can’t take it anymore, blurting out --

Come on -- Sasha and Lisa pull Ryan into the nearest bar. Dina follo

A crowded bar full of day-drinkers. Sasha shows Ryan the photo. Ryan silently swallows.
Ryan, I don’t know what to say...
We're all here for you, Ry. 26  Official White 6-15-16 25.
Don’t worry Boo, I’ma lay hands on him for you. Hot grits, extension cords, Timberland heel. I’ma go in! The ladies brace for an insane reaction. Ryan looks up fr the photo. She’s surprisingly calm.
I’ve known about this for a few months now. The ladies’ jaws drop. The fuck?!
Obviously, I was upset when I found out, but we’re in counseling and we’re working through it.
Oh. Well, that’s great. You're working it out.
Stewart and I are a team. He made some mistakes, but that’s in the past.

She just fucked me up with that.  Official White 6-15-16 26.
Now, let’s get out of here! Flossy Posse’s back in N’awlins! Let’s go!

Journalism? Is that what this is? Sasha gives her a look. Ryan concedes.
What do you think I should do?
Let me find out if anyone else has it. And if not, you let me leak the photo.

Hear me out. If I leak it, we can get in front of the story. We can steer the conversation instead of TMZ. This way, you and I find an angle to minimize the damage. Ryan hates that this is what her life has become.

Oh, hey there’s Stewart. (then, remembering) Oh. Asshole. Dina can barely contain her anger. Sasha takes notice.
Dina, look at me. Do not make a scene. You heard Ryan. Be cool.
Oh, I’m gone be real cool. Just gonna say hey, that’s all -- Dina takes off her earrings.  Official White 6-15-16 28.

Mmmhmmm. Hold these. She hands the earrings to Lisa and plows toward Stewart. and Sasha run after her.
Dina, no!!! Drake’s “0 to 100” drops. The ladies watch, horrified, as Dina clears the entire table. Food and drinks spill everywhere. Stewart stands, pissed, glares at Dina.

You KNOW, nigga! Don’t play me! Dina grabs an empty bottle off an adjacent table, breaks and moves to hit him, but Sasha pulls her back.
Dina, no!
I will END YOU. You and your little thirsty ass, wannabe MILF, hood rat, side tossup ho! (to Marian) You got on knee-pads under them slacks, Slurpee?
Dina, this is my Aunt Marion!
Yeah? Well, listen up, Auntie: yo nephew is NASTY. Sasha grabs Dina, pulling her away. The entire lounge eye them. Lisa awkwardly stands with Stewart and Marian.
(to Marian) That's a beautiful suit. Navy is such a beautiful color on you. Really brings out your eyes.  29 Official White 6-15-16 29.
Uh... thank you. I guess.

Well, nice meeting you. Please resume your meal. (beat) And for what it’s worth, I’m very disappointed in you Stewart. Very. Lisa crosses back to Sasha who has calmed Dina down. The entire lounge eyes them.
A SECURITY GUARD approaches Dina.
I’m gonna need you to leave the premises immediately.
It’s fine. We've got everything under control now.
(re Dina) She's holding a broken Pellegrino bottle. Lisa carefully takes the broken bottle from Dina’s hand. runs up to them, at a loss to what just happened.
What the hell happened?! I was gone for three minutes!

Let’s go... The ladies and Simone scurry, converging toward the stage
Looks like we have a few hungry volunteers.
Who the fuck are these chicks? Ryan silently fumes as Simone approaches and gets a sampl from a VOLUNTEER. Lisa cuts her off and takes it instead.
Oh, sorry. I just wanted a taste.
I think you’ve tasted enough. Ryan made this meal with Stew. Not you.
(tasting it) For real. And it’s good than a motherfucker. Ryan you can cook!
It’s really good, but I’d really love more sausage in mine.  Official White 6-15-16 62.
(maintaining composure) Really? How about it Stew: you gonna give her some more sausage?
(throat clear) Well, the customer is always right.
Oh. Apparently there’s an abundance of sausage to go around. Stewart just loves to dole it out---
(intervening) Ryan. Just how much sausage should be added?

When it comes to sausage it all depends on how greedy you want to be before stuffing it in your bowl. Ryan grabs a MEAT CLEAVER swinging it dangerously close t Stewart who has to weave out of the way.
You can chop it. . Whack whack whack goes the cleaver into the sausage.
You can slice it sideways--- Ryan slices with a CHEF’S KNIFE splitting the sausage in half, then methodically slicing it in little pieces.
You can even grind it. Ryan grabs two sausages, tosses them in a meat grinder an goes to work making mincemeat.
Isn’t sausage ground up already?
Yes, but one might choke on chunky bits of sausage. Ryan tosses a bowl of jambalaya with extra sausage to Sim  Official White 6-15-16
Only if you have a gag-reflex.
Oooh, this bitch gonna get hurt.
Are they still talking about jambalaya?
Uh-huh. Yeah. It’s colloquial: “put your foot in it”, “so good make ya wanna slap ya mamma” “bitch gonna get hurt” Same etymology.
This ladies and gentlemen this may be the epitome of too many cooks in the kitchen.
Thanks for the sample. I'll be sure to try it again. Simone saunters off. Ryan calls after her.
You should move on from this one--
(cutting) Uhhh because there’s plenty of more delicious food ...
Out here at Essence eats .. .
So get your own, ho!
And that is the Essence of Cooking! 63. APPLAUSE from the audience. Lisa/Sasha/Dina/Ryan and Stew all bow. Bethany beams.  Official White 6-15-16
Ryan and Stewart walk backstage.
What the hell was that, Ry?
You're asking me? You were supposed to keep the sausage gobbler in check. What happened to that?
That was not my fault --
Oh, so your penis ended up in her mouth how exactly? Because let’s be clear: that’s how this started.
You're gonna have to figure out how to get yourself under control... Elizabeth enters.
That was fucking amazing! The crowd loved it. Bethany loved it. Were those your girls? I thought there were only three? Who’s the hottie with the badonkadonk?
She’s nobody. Never seen her before.
Crap. I should get her number --
No!
No worries. It’s better improvised. Stewart, can I steal you for a minute? There’s a reporter who’s a football fan. He walks off with Elizabeth. Ryan takes a deep breath.
I am strong, I am powerful... I am... 64. 60  61 Official White 6-15-16 65. She stops as her eyes mist. The mask is off. She breathes deeply, trying to find inner strength. Sasha walks up.
You good, Ry? Ryan pulls herself together. Turns around, smiling.
Yeah, girl. All good! That was kinda crazy, huh?
Little bit.
Thanks for having my back up there.
Of course. You sure you’re good?
Yup. All in a day’s work. I’ve got a fan meet and greet -- I’1l catch up with y’all later, okay? She walks off, holding it together. Sasha is concerned.

Thousands of people walk through the center as sponsors h panels on everything from beauty and style to business to empowerment and music. Celebrities including Tyrese and Morris Chestnut wave to and interact with fans. Dina scre
Oh my God! ‘Rese! Tyrese! Be my baby-boy, puleeeeeezeee!! She goes to pull up her shirt and Lisa stops her.
Dina, I swear to God if don't control yourself...

I’m just saying I’d leave Diddy for Tyrese. Lisa rolls her eyes. Sasha is busy checking her email on phone. She has an OVERDRAFT NOTICE from her bank and an EVICTION NOTICE from her landlord.  62 63 Official White 6-15-16 66.
What the hell--?
Everything okay?

Yeah... it will be. INT. RITZ CARLTON - GIRLS’ SUITE BAR AREA - AFTERNOON 62 Dina’s behind the bar mixing drinks like a pro, discreetl pouring a generous amount of ABSINTHE in each glass. Musi blasts through the TV’s iTunes connection and iPhotos of Flossy Posse from past Essence Fests rotate on screen.
You’ve got the Crabwalk, the Butter Churner, the Organ Grinder... sometimes they cry during that one.
Why would you want them to cry?
Power.
(popping head in) Can you turn that down? I’m on the phone! Sasha turns down the music. Sasha and Dina exchange looks
Oooh, she need some dick.
Lisa resumes FaceTime with Riley and Austin.
I've gotta go, we’re gonna go listen to a man sing some songs. Make sure Meemaw puts you to bed now. Ryan walks by and waves to the kids.  Official White 6-15-16 67.
Hi guys! Bye guys! (to Lisa) So cute! As Lisa hangs up --

You and Stewart ever talk about it? Maybe a baby will help bring you closer. Kids change men. Didn’t change Terrence... but hell, maybe you'll get lucky. And no one will ever love you like your babies.
Oh yeah. We talk about it -- I’ve just been so focused on career.
Well don’t wait too long. No one will ever love you like your babies.
Until they become ungrateful fucking teenagers
Don’t listen to her. Before Ryan can respond the sound of a door knock is hear
Elizabeth enters the open door, smiling.
Is this the Flossy Posse suite?
Who's asking?
Ryan’s agent, Elizabeth. Saw you guys at the demo. “That bitch gonna get hurt.” So fun. Ryan walks out of the bedroom, nervous at seeing Dina and Elizabeth in the same proximity.
Hey...  Official White 6-15-16 68.
Bethany wants to meet you and Stewart tonight at the White party. I know you’re with the F to the P, just hang out with her for fifteen minutes. Inspire her to add another zero to the deal...
Y’all cool to hang out at a party for a little bit before we go to the concert?
Who’s Bethany?
She's the Calmart exec giving me and Stewart our own BRAND.
Oh, THAT Bethany! We love that bitch! Let’s make a toast.
Ooh, did you make us hurricanes?
Fuck a hurricane. This is a tsunami.
I was thinking maybe just wine tonight...
Did you put on your granny panties again? We got drinking to do! Dina hands one to Elizabeth.
Welcome to Saturday night Flossy Posse style... Ryan shoots Elizabeth a look like, “Don’t worry, it’s jus one drink.” Dina raises her glass, as do the others.
To Bethany. And the shit-ton of money she’s going to give Ryan.
And Stewart...  65 Official White 6-15-16 69.
Yeah, that motherfucker, too. Ryan shoots Dina a “shut-up” look as they all down their drinks.
So, I’ll see you there? And don’t forget we’ve got the signing meeting tomorrow. Let’s be bright- eyed and bushy-tailed. She eyes Dina, worried.
You have my word. Tonight I’m taking it easy.
Dass mah gurrll... They all look at Elizabeth crazy. Then--
Okay, she’s cut off.
Super exclusive, VIP Essence-sponsored party. Sasha, Lisa Dina get busy to a NEW HIP-HOP JAM. Sasha looks out into the crowd.
Is that Pharrell? I can’t tell. Why does he look so blurry? The music changes and the crowd looks like they’re slowin down. The girls start to sway a bit.
I feel a little funny. Do you feel funny?
Feel funny? (feeling herself) I feel fine. See? Feel me? Lisa rubs her.
Why are you feeling her?  66 67 Official White 6-15-16 70.
Because she axed did she feel funny? (giggling) I said axed.
You did. (looking) Oo, baller-alert. Bye, bitches. Dina takes off out of frame.
Is she moving in slow motion or am I hearing in slow motion? Sasha looks up at the stars painted on the ceiling.

Oh shit -- do not look up! MONTAGE of the ladies tripping: -In Sasha’s POV she’s hurling through space -Dina dances with a model-looking type guy and she is int him, grinding her ass all over his crotch as the camera m to reveal a hideous dude who can’t believe his luck. -Lisa looks toward a myriad of statues of Jazz Musicians suddenly animate and come to life. Lisa is mezmerized.
Dina steps up to the bar.

One grapefruit please. And a knife. She has a devilish look on her face. INT. SWANKY LOUNGE - WOMEN’S ROOM - NIGHT 67 Dina and her “model” go into a a women’s room stall with grapefruit and shut the door while Lisa is in the mirror applying her make-up like a 6-year-old would.
Pretty! Meanwhile, outside the stall--  68 Official White 6-15-16 71. DINA’S “DATE” (0.S.) Damn, girl! Ooooh. That’s some freaky shit!
- Sasha tries to walk through the crowd, despite the fact that all the party-goers look upside down. She finds Lisa now in crazy make-up.
There’s a bear in here! Plus, I figured out time travel. Dina walks up, bent at a 70 degree angle, clothes now on backwards.
I just burped and a rainbow came out. The rest of the party-goers stare at them, shaking their heads.
What’re they looking at? Dina looks at Sasha, her face is an undulating Mardi Gras mask.
Oh shit how you do that? That's dope... Dina grabs Sasha’s face. Sasha pushes her hands away.
Stop playing! I told you there’s bear in here.
You know what? I think we might be trippin’.
Where’s Ryan?
She can’t trip in front of Bethany!  69 Official White 6-15-16 72.
Ryan, now sweaty and dizzy is in a VIP booth with Stewart Elizabeth and Bethany trying her best to focus.
I just loved your cooking demo today. The way you two played off of each other was fantastic. So much fun.
We’re all about fun. Funnn Funnn! Ryan starts rubbing ice cubes on her face.
Are you feeling okay?
I'm just so thirsty -- Ryan takes a sip of water and completely misses her mouth
Let me get you a napkin. He dabs her forehead with it. Whispering to her --
What the hell are you on?!
What?! Nigga chill out -- Bethany is taken aback as is Stewart, but then his attent is caught by --
Dina walking across the room taking off her clothes.
Why it so damn hot?
She looks up at the WAITRESS, who now appears to be Simon but only to Ryan.
Can I get you anything?  Official White 6-15-16 73.
(to Stewart) What the hell she doing here?
She’s here to take our order.
I can come back--
Don’t. You. Dare. The waitress scurries off. Stewart leans into Ryan.
What the hell’s gotten into you?
The devil--?
(to Bethany) So, tell me more about the Calmart philosophy.
Well-- Suddenly, Elizabeth starts laughing hysterically. Ryan tr to step in and address a confused Bethany.
So you were saying, Bethanyyiiii!!! Bethany’s eyes begin to BUG OUT like they’re animated.
Oh, shit! Elizabeth continues laughing then starts pecking at Stewa shoulder like a chicken. He shrugs her off and she starts doing it to Bethany.

I’m not sure what’s happening here... Ryan looks around the party. There’s SIMONE. She blinks h eyes. And there she is dancing, then by the bar drinking, a booth eating, chatting on a couch -- everywhere Ryan lo Simone is there.  70 Official White 6-15-16 74.
Excuse me. I need some fresh air. Ryan takes off, leaving Stewart there to cover on the fly
My apologies, Bethany. Ryan's been taking a new allergy medicine and it’s had some side effects.
(referring to Elizabeth) What’s her excuse? Elizabeth is on the ground in fetus position laughing har
Sasha, Dina and Lisa are trying to get to Ryan. But they’ moving in slow motion. Barely covering ground.
We've gotta save Ry! If we’re trippin, she’s trippin.
I’m not tripping, but I’m feeling niiiiice Ryan spots them.
We need to leave! Now! The tsunami has hit! The tsunami has hit!
On the street, the Flossy Posse are all clearly still on absinthe high. Guzzling water from a street vendor. Ryan turns to Dina, pissed.
What the hell did you put in those drinks?!
Love.
Dina, I’m not playing!  71 Official White 6-15-16 75.
.+.- and a little absinthe. I may have over poured.
None of y’all saw the bear?
Fuck! Bethany just saw me like this. We need to hide but I’m too fucked up to find the hotel.
(like a child) Look! Pretty hair! She points at a booth on the street where someone is sell WIGS and SUNGLASSES. Cash Money's “Bling-Bling”, pours out from the open door ratchet bar next door.
You know Bethany won’t find you in there... Let’s go set it off. Lisa and Sasha look at each other like WIF this bitch tal about, before they follow her. Ryan does the same.
The ladies burst into the bar -- WIGS AND SUNGLASSES ON. Still amped. Throwback southern hip hop blasts. This crow ratchet as hell. Ryan goes unrecognized.
Booty sweat and Hennessy in the air. We have found our tribe! All of a sudden Q-Tip’s “Vivrant Thing” comes on.

Oh hell yeah. Let’s dance this shit off. The ladies hit the floor, doing their old sorority step dances. The crowd goes wild. The Flossy Posse owns the fl Until... A group of YOUNG CHICKS, 20s, trashy as fuck, answer the call. They bring the noise.  72 Official White 6-15-16 76.
Y'all might wanna sit down and rest.

Keep talkin, Kesha. The DJ alternates newer and older songs as the crews batt He reaches into his 1997 arsenal and hits them with Maste P’s “Make ‘Em Say Uhhh” and the Flossy Posse brings the h Ryan is having a blast -- no inhibitions. In disguise. Fr Then, Fetty Wap’s “Trap Queen” drops and the Young Chicks tear it up. But the Flossy Posse will not be outdone. “Lo Control” by Missy Elliot comes on and they kill it.

Four shot glasses toast. The Flossy Posse is unstoppable. Before they can knock it back-- Simone walking by bumps i Dina. Record scratch moment. Oh shit. Simone pales, realizing who they are. And they recognize
You know what? Everyone expects me to beat your ass right now -- but I’m all about love tonight. You have hallucinogens to thank for that. Lisa CLOCKS SIMONE IN THE FACE. Hard.
Mine wore off. Now it’s on. One of Simone’s Crew goes after Lisa.
Well, shit, if Lisa starts a party, I will fucking attend!! She smacks Simone hard. But Simone is trash. She’s got mo She punches Dina in the face. Hard. Dina smiles.

Thank you. Now I can beat your ass with no remorse whatsoever.  73 Official White 6-15-16 77. An all out brawl ensues. Dina unloads on Simone. Sasha ju on Simone’s back. Lisa punches all of Simone’s friends. Letting out years of repressed divorced anger. Ryan is in the perfect position to clock Simone like a motherfucker until -- Blue lights flash outside and a CLUB PATRON yells.
Five-oh, y’all! Ryan settles for grabbing Simone’s fake tit and wrenching
Titty Twister! EXT. RATCHET BAR —- NIGHT - MOMENTS LATER 73 Ryan gets her head slammed on the hood of car, outside of bar, cuffed. Wigs crooked, sunglasses broken.
I’m gonna kill you, Lis! Slam down goes Lisa into frame
I don’t know what got into me. A couple POLICE OFFICERS sit Lisa and Ryan next to Sasha Dina on an outdoor bench. Other COPS interview witnesses.
We are so FUCKED!
Relax! I’ve been here before. It’s just a misdemeanor. Once we post bail --
Bail?! Do you hear yourself? I am not a rapper! I’m a therapist! I write self-help books! I can not go to jail!
Martha Stewart went to jail. People still listen to her advice about cranberry centerpieces or whatever the fuck it is she talks about.  Official White 6-15-16 78. Ryan starts panic breathing.
Ry, relax! It was self-defense.
(as if) I threw the first punch.
Yeah, and you clocked the shit out that bitch.
Straight knuckles.
(chuckling in spite of) You did, Lis. “Mine wore off.” Pow! They all laugh about it. Ad-libbing about what they did. reality starts to set in on Lisa.
Wait a minute. This could end me. I'll lose my license. I could lose my kids over this.
Aww shot she about to blow. She looks over at a FAT COP.
No, I’m not. I got this. She walks over to the Fat Cop. On a mission.
He writes out a ticket as Lisa walks up.
(helpless) Officer, these cuffs are so tight. Is there any way you can take them off? The cop doesn’t even look up.
Nope. Lisa tries a different tactic.  Official White 6-15-16 79.
But I’m afraid the interstitial pressure on my radial nerve could lead to arterial ischemia or necrosis. The cop looks up, impressed.
You a doctor?
Just a registered nurse.
How’d a woman like you end up ina bar fight? He removes her cuffs.
To be honest, my friends and I were roofied tonight and it caused us to act really out of character.
(concerned) You know who did it?
(eyeing Dina) Hard to say.
Lucky you didn’t get hurt in there. Little thing like you could barely even throw a punch, I bet.
Not one you'd feel...
Thank you for taking those cuffs off. Feels so good to be free! She waves her hands in the air, really sexing it up as sh dances. The Fat Cop is smitten.
The other ladies watch from the bench as Lisa makes small talk, giggles at the COP’s jokes..  Official White 6-15-16 80.
Here we go -- take it home, Daytona Beach Lisa. Take it home.

head_text.subj: ON THE FAT COP AND LISA

text: She's flirting up a storm.

Is there any way my friends and I could just go back to our hotel? You really want to write up all that paperwork over little me? The Fat Cop looks around to make sure none of the other c are watching.
I‘mma make an exception. For you.
Our ladies come up the escalator giddy with laughter.
Lis, you have my undying gratitude.
That was some Jedi voodoo sex magic is what that was.
Yeah, too bad it’s going to waste. As they round the corner, Malik awaits holding a flower. Wearing a tie. Lisa cups her hand to her ear.
Sorry, Sash, what was that?
(surprised) Okay. Get it, bitch. Get it.
Oh I’m going to. Tonight -- I slay. Her sexual confidence is now fully restored. She gives Ma a smile as she takes the flower from him.
Yassssss hunty. Yassssss!  Official White 6-15-16 81. Lisa takes his hand and practically skips to the elevator
He better fuck the shit outta her.
Remember when life was that simple? Just wanting a boy to like us enough to want to give ‘em some.
That’s all we cared about. That and having no money. Those problems are in the past thank God. Ryan looks at her, sincere.
I miss you, Sash. I really do.
I miss you, too.
We were gonna take over the world back then.
Never got around to that, did we?
I hate to see you chasing after celebrity bullshit. It’s beneath you. You’re so much better than that. Sasha realizes Ryan didn’t mean it to sound condescending
I’m good. I’m handling mine. Ryan smiles and nods. Not wanting to fight.
Okay.

(beat) Ry, you don’t need the bullshit either. Don’t be afraid to step out your comfort zone. You can do it. Ryan knows what she means. The elevator doors open and several drunken late 50s Essence Fest attendees are insid  75 Official White 6-15-16 82. singing “Booty Poppin” by Ludacris and doing the accompan dance moves.
That’s us in twenty years, y’all.
God, I hope so. INT. RITZ CARLTON - GIRL’S SUITE LIVING ROOM - NIGHT - LA Dina, Sasha and Ryan are on the couch, giggling as they s down food.
Dina, you did not go in a bathroom stall with Jason Momoa! He wasn’t even at the party!

Bitch, I got pictures! She pulls out her phone and pulls up a photo. We see a qu flash of a man’s balls on her forehead with his limp dick hanging down her nose -- like a Roman Helmet. Dina frowns when she sees the face of the dick’s owner.
Who the fuck is that?
And why is his business on your face?
(laughing) I think they call that a Roman Helmet. Dina flips through the pictures and there’s one of SASHA getting Roman Helmeted too.
Look, you got one, too!
What?! Erase that! As Sasha reels from this -- they hear a moan from the bedroom.  76 Official White 6-15-16
The beaver took down the tree! 83. The bedroom door opens and a disheveled, recently fucked steps out, wrapped in a towel.
Just gonna grab this -- She grabs a grapefruit out of the fruit basket on the tab and goes back into the bedroom with a smile.
Ohhh... it’s on! Prepare yourselves, ladies. Five, four, three, two... Malik’s MOANS tell us that Dina is right.
Damn! I’ve gotta try this! Suddenly, Malik SCREAMS so loud the windows rattle.
Oh my God, did she just bite it off? Lisa yanks open the bedroom door.

Grapefruit juice just shot in his eye! Where’s my Visine! Lisa digs through her bag. Malik comes staggering out, grapefruit still on his dick (covering it). One hand over eye, one hand over his balls.
(wailing) Why, Jesus? Why?
his 76 All four girls are in the king bed. Dina pours some mini- champagne.
I don’t care how late it is, we are toasting that Lisa got ten inches tonight.  77 78 79 80 Official White 6-15-16
I wish we could've seen it without the grapefruit on it.
Hand me my phone --
Good girl! 84. Lisa pulls up a picture. They all stare at it in silent a
That is a beautiful penis.
It’s a work of art. Dina sends the picture to herself.
I'm taking this to Walgreens and having it printed out to put on my desk at work. The ladies laugh.
77 The ladies all kneel beside the bed praying in unison as FADE TO BLACK.
The sun rises over the Mississippi.
Ryan and Stewart sign books for fans. Doing their “Happy Couple” show. Smiling, taking pictures. People love them. the line is lengthy.
Lisa and Dina explore the food booths, feeding their hangovers. 78 79 And 80  81 Official White 6-15-16 85.
What you mean there ain’t no etoufee left? I waited all this damn time. What you got then? Red beans and rice? Aight.
Excuse me is that cooked in animal fat?
Hell no. It’s just some hamhock. A few hundred feet away, Sasha’s on her phone.

(desperate) Wait! Don’t pull your ads! I’ve got audio of Tyler Perry cussing me out like a sailor... What d’you mean that’s not news?... Fine. I'll get something good. ‘Jay-Z and Solange elevator’ good. By tomorrow. Sasha hangs up. Against the wall and out of options. She looks at the picture of Simone and Stewart on her phone a shakes her head. The sound of applause is heard, then --
The question is not “if” but “when”? Sasha looks over to a healthy crowd gathered around Essen Center Stage where beloved guest, IYANLA VANZANT speaks t attentive crowd.
Ryan and Stewart are being escorted toward the exit, but pauses to take a listen.

When will you realize the power for change is in your hands? You can’t wait for someone else to make the decision that will affect you in your life. Only you can do that? You want better? You deserve better? Then do better. Demand it of yourself. Even if it means change. And beloved, change takes time, takes effort, takes bravery.  82 Official White 6-15-16 86. Listening in the crowd is Sasha. Two hundred yards away R also listens.

Don’t you dare ask anyone to change unless you put in the work yourself. Fight the good fight. The bad fight has enough soldiers. The message has resonated with both Ryan and Sasha. Eliza catches Ryan’s attention to take her to the back.
Ryan and Stewart are at a table with Elizabeth, Bethany a some guys in Suits.
You two have built an incredible brand. And we want in. We think the Ryan Stewart brand can be to Calmart what Martha Stewart is to K- Mart. But bigger.
Really?
Bottom line you two give people hope of having it all. And we want in.
Sounds fantastic.
Yes it does. But let’s be honest, it’s all about the offer. Bethany scribbles down a number and slides it across the table. Elizabeth, ever the negotiator intercepts the pape
Holy fuck--! Ryan and Stewart read it, stunned. More money than they e expected. Bethany stands and shakes Ryan and Stewart’s respective hands.
Look forward to working with you. She and her team head out.  83 84 Official White 6-15-16 87.
I’ll see you out... Elizabeth gives Ryan and Stewart fist pump before exiting After a beat. Ryan and Stewart look at each other.
Looks like we did it. Stewart is too stunned to respond as Ryan heads off camer
Ryan and Stewart head to their SUV as many screaming fans cheer them. Ryan half-heartedly waves. Stewart is pensive before pulling the driver to the side a beat before joini Ryan.
Ryan sips on water and checks her phone as Stewart climbs and shuts the door. Other than the hum of the motor, the and the screaming fans it is silent. Ryan notices.
Where’s the driver?
Ryan, I’m sorry. Ryan turns to Stewart, eyes glistening. Ryan looks concer
What the fuck is wrong with you?
I been wrong.
Uhhh okay--?
“I been wrong.” I been saying it without any real consequence. It’s just been words. And I’ve been wrong for that.
Alright, you been wrong, you’ve been going through the motions. I get it. Can we go? I have a little bit of a headache--  85 Official White 6-15-16 88.
This deal is incredible. The possibilities are limitless. I’m amped. I’m energized.
Yeah, it’s a lot of money...

No. You don’t understand: This is the kick in the ass I needed. (off her look) When I retired from football I was messed up. I didn’t what my purpose was. Who was I without this game? Dumb male ego shit. As much as you tried to show me and encourage me I couldn’t hear. I didn’t want to hear it.
Kind of like how I feel right now-?

Ry, I don’t blame you for wanting to shut me out. I wouldn’t want to hear me either. But we did it. We did this together. We’re back. And now everything can be the way you want it. We can be Ryan and Stewart again. And I don’t mean some public persona “us”. I mean “us.” You and me: the man you fell in love with. Ryan looks at the sincerity in his eyes, still unsure. He takes her hands and kneels on the car floor.
I promise you if you give us another chance I’m in this for real. No more show. No more bullshit. Stewart is as vulnerable as ever. Ryan is torn.
A magnum of champagne is popped and poured.

Thank you, Calmart!!!  Official White 6-15-16 89. Sasha snaps a selfie of the ladies, champagne flutes in h She tags everyone and posts it on social media. #EssenceF #HOBNOLA. Ping! Dina looks down at her phone.
Damn, bitch! I could never be C.I.A. with you posting my business everywhere.
(to Sasha) Then you need to quit that, because if anyone’s taking out Isis, it’s this bitch -- She clinks glasses with Dina. Then addresses Sasha
Hey, do you think your paparazzi guy would sell the photo to me? We could bury this shit and move forward.
(nodding, skeptical) I could find out. What’s going on?
Well, ladies Stew and I had a real talk today and I really think our marriage is going to get back on track.
Really? Oh my God that’s great, Ry.
You taking dirty-dick back?
Look, y’all men have egos... his was deflated. Retiring fucked him up. That’s how men are: rudderless, needing a purpose.
Well, alright. It’s used, not broke.
You should have seen it: he practically begged me to stick with us. I saw the sincerity in his eyes. I’ve haven’t seen that since--  86 Official White 6-15-16 90.
His last big contract.
Sasha, I have faith--
Faith that fame and money are worth your dignity and self-respect?
(beat) Why can’t you be happy for me?
Yeah, don’t hate, Sash.
I’m not hating. I’1l just be happy when she’s happy. Truly happy. I know what Ryan happy looks like. I ain’t seen it in a minute. Ryan is taken aback.
Come on, you guys, this is a good thing. Let’s celebrate this, okay? The band strikes up from the main room and the CROWD star to cheer.
Solange commands the stage. Julian’s sexy on bass.
There he is!
Aw shit. Look who grew up and grew a pair. Alright, Julian. I see you!
He’s working that bass!
Yeah, he is --  87 Official White 6-15-16 91. Julian performs a gripping solo. Everyone cheers. Julian the crowd, his eyes landing on Ryan and the girls. Giving them a wink.
Ryan and Julian sit on a couch.
So, I know you’ve got your professional life on lock, but how you doing otherwise?
I’m good! Really, really blessed.
You and Stewart doing okay?
Better than ever. Julian studies her. Knows something’s up.
You don’t have to do that with me, Ry. I know you. Ain’t no bluff in you.
So my sincerity is a curse?
I wouldn’t have you any other way. You just can’t be my spades partner.
(laughing) It’s like that? I see where I stand. But seriously, we are fine. I’m just nervous about the speech tomorrow.
Why? You’ve always been one of the most self-assured people I’ve ever known.  88 Official White 6-15-16
I don’t know about that--
Bullshit. You do know about it. From the moment you walked on campus, you owned it. Not cocky, just matter of fact: “I’m the shit, y'all. Recognize.” They share a laugh.
Didn't know then how challenging it would be to get here now.
Clearly that didn’t matter ‘cuz you got everything you could ever want.
(nodding) Yeah. I guess that’s true. 92. Julian holds up his drink to toast. Ryan clinks with him.
88 Sasha comes out of the ladies room and spots -- Simone ma a beeline for the Ryan. Sasha intercepts her.
Where the hell do you think you’re going?
I need to talk to Ryan. Sasha steps to Simone.
That’s not gonna happen. Let’s go--
Ryan spots Sasha with Simone and frowns. Sasha backs out of sight.
How’d you even know she was here? Simone  Official White 6-15-16 93. Simone pulls up her SMART PHONE to display Sasha’s Instag
I gotta get a new line of work. Look, I‘ll relay the message. What’s up?
I’m pregnant. And before you even insult me, yes, it’s Stewart’s. Sasha’s jaw drops. Not at all expecting this.
Does he know?
I left him a message. He won’t call me back.
I'll try to find some tears to shed for you.
Look, I don’t need your shade. That’s not why I came here--
Then why did you?

I didn’t know who else to tell. I need Stewart to call me back within the next twenty-four hours or I will go public. I have pictures. Nasty-freaky ones too. You wanna be the one to break the story? Be my
guest.
You must be high. And ya ass is fake. Simone walks off. Lisa walks up to Sasha.
What was that about?
She’s pregnant.
What?  89 90 Official White 6-15-16 94.
Yup. The biggest damn story of the year and I can’t even run it. Come on. Sasha heads toward Ryan. Lisa gives pause before followin
Julian and Ryan reminisce. Ryan laughs loudly as Lisa, Sa and Dina approach with serious faces. Julian notices.
Everything alright? Ryan spins around, senses the gravity of the situation.
What... what is it? INT. RITZ CARLTON - GIRLS’ SUITE - NIGHT 90 Ryan, tear-stained eyes, sits in a robe on the couch. Her girls surround her. Lisa rubs her back.
I tried everything. I went to all the top specialists, tried every fertility treatment on the market... She gave him what I couldn't. That’s why he did it.
Ry, why didn’t you tell us you were having trouble getting pregnant?
Because I was embarrassed! I didn’t want anyone to know --
We're not just “anyone”. We're your girls. You have a problem, you tell us! There’s a KNOCK at the door. Lisa looks through the peeph
It’s Stewart.
Oh, hell no./The fuck does he want?  Official White 6-15-16 95.
Ryan, please. We need to talk. Ryan gestures to let him in. The ladies all glare at him.
Alone. Ryan hesitates, then, to the girls --
Can you give us a minute? The ladies exchange looks, but do as their told.
We'll wait for you downstairs. Dina removes something from her purse and hands it to Rya

Take my taser. Just in case. You can turn up the voltage with that dial on the side... Fuck it, I’1l just leave it on high. Dina mouths “I’m watching you” to Stewart, then leaves. R and Stewart sit down across from each other.
I could kill you. That’s how furious I am right now.
I talked to Simone. She’s agreed to sign an NDA in exchange for a monthly payment for her and the baby--
So that makes everything okay?! You got her pregnant, when I can’t?
We can still do this, Ry. No one will know. You don’t have to believe me, but we can make it all work. The deal, all of it. Ryan glares at him in disbelief.
It’s not just about the money, Stew! Do you have any idea how much (MORE )
91 Official White 6-15-16 96.
you've hurt me? You’ve ruined everything! How can I trust you?
I know you can’t trust me as your husband anymore. But you can trust me as your business partner. This deal will set us up for life. We can’t do it if we’re apart.
Do you even love me?
Of course I do, babe. But this is bigger than love. It’s marriage. Ryan stares at him, knowing she’s selling her soul if she stays.
Ryan without Stewart doesn’t have it all...
Dina, Lisa and Sasha sit in lounge chairs.
I hope she kicked his cheating ass out and tased his dickskin until it smelled like bacon.
Damn, Lis. You were the one talking “work it out” --
Changed my mind the minute I saw that look on his face. Fuck him and the ho he rode in on.
Amen! Ryan walks up, game face on.
How'd it go?
Stew’s figured out a way to handle the Simone situation.  Official White 6-15-16 Their jaws drop.
So, you're staying with him?
Yes, we both made mistakes. But we've had some good times together.
Did he dickmatize you that quick?!
Dina, he’s my husband. Not some guy in a bathroom stall. I’m not going to just throw everything away. Ryan’s phone RINGS. She ignores it.
I get it, Ryan. You're scared. When I left Terrence, I was terrified. I didn’t think I could make it on my own. But I’m figuring it out. You will too. I’1l help.
So I can live with my mother like you?
Wow. Shots fired.
I’m sorry, but everything I have is dependent on us staying together! My career, my brand -- I can’t do it alone. If I give all this up -- I have nothing.

Bullshit. You don’t need him! The Ryan we met freshman year was already a star way before Stewart sashayed his ass into the picture. And by the way, we all know that proposal story is bullshit. We were there!
Yeah, he was so drunk he didn’t even remember he proposed until you told him the next day. 97.  Official White 6-15-16
He gave you a ring made out of a gum wrapper.
Is there even anything real left with you two?
I don’t expect you to get it. You're all single! You don’t have any clue about how a relationship works! Whoa. This smacks them hard. Silence.
The only reason I’m single is because there’s no such thing as too many dicks.
You're gonna get herpes with that attitude.
Where the hell do you get off judging our personal lives?
Says the woman who talks shit about people for a living! Way to use that journalism degree --
Who’s talking shit now? I got advanced degrees, bitch. You the one with the bullshit MRS.
Everybody breathe, dammit! Time the fuck out!
(to Ryan) That herpes shit was low. 98. Ryan’s phone RINGS again. She finally answers the call. I Elizabeth. Ryan walks off to talk to her.
Hello.  Official White 6-15-16 99. Sasha’s phone begins BLOWING UP with alerts. “Ryan and Stewart Pierce Mistress Scandal.”
Oh shit... Lisa and Dina look at Sasha, alarmed by her tone.
What’s wrong? Ryan walks back up, pissed. Going right for Sasha’s throa
You conniving bitch! Dina jumps in to keep them separated.
Damn! You bitches got strong!
I didn’t leak it, I swear -- Simone must have.

I saw you all huddled up with her. What’d you sell it to another site to cover your tracks? I know you’re broke. Don’t think I didn’t notice all the tags hanging off your clothes. We all did. Sasha looks guilty that she’s exposed.
Yeah/those aren’t red bottoms/I've done it before
How much did you get for ruining my life?
Oh shit. It’s gone viral! #YouCantHaveItAll is trending.
Congratulations, Sash. Whatever you got, I hope it was worth it.
You know what, Ryan? Truth is, I did consider releasing it, but I (MORE )
Official White 6-15-16 100.
didn’t because you mean more to me than money. But you never valued our friendship as much as you value your own success.
How can you say that? I’ve always been a friend to you!

No, you haven’t! I worked my ass off getting our website off the ground. I quit my job at The Times, hired a designer... And what did you do? Left me high and dry! Because you thought you’d have a better chance at fame with Stewart. And NOT ONCE have you apologized!
If you had said no, I wouldn’t have! You should’ve spoken up.
You should have never put me in that position in the first place!
I mean... you could’ve said no.
Dina, nobody asked you--
Sasha, I don’t think Ryan --
Just stop. I should’ve known better than to expect you two to back me. In this circle, we all know there’s a queen... and her two worker bees.
Bitch, who you calling a worker bee? Better take that shit back.
You know why we never hang out at home? Because we don’t like getting banned from restaurants.
It was The Olive Garden! Who gives a fuck?  92 93 Official White 6-15-16 101.
Okay! Everybody, TIME OUT!
Lisa! Shut up. We’re not your kids!
Then stop acting like it! You know what? I don’t need this. I’m going back home where I’m appreciated! Lisa walks off.

Fuck it. Me, too. I’1ll hitchhike if I have to. Better than being around a bunch of phony-ass bitches who forget how to be friends. (to Ryan) You owe me a taser. She leaves. Sasha and Ryan are left standing there.
You satisfied, Sasha?! You ruined my life and twenty years of friendship. She walks off.
Are all you bitches still on absinthe? I didn’t do anything!

location: NEW ORLEANS CRESCENT CITY CONNECTION BRIDGE

text: The sun rises over the Crescent City.
Dina swirls her straw in a drink. Not drinking it.

You want me to make you something else instead? Dina shakes her head-- no cocktail’s going to fix this. The Hobo who flashed his junk to them at the shitty motel enters. Drunk, not recognizing her.  Official White 6-15-16
You got any change?
You don’t remember me? He squints at her.
You Rochelle?
Yeah, I’m Rochelle. You ready for our date? She pulls out a purple strap-on-head-dildo from her purse The Hobo hesitates for a moment, then --
Where we gonna go? Dina’s had enough.
Freak. Pull up a chair.
94 Lisa sits on a bench FaceTiming with her mom, who's playi Twister with her grand-kids, tangled up like a pretzel.
I need you to get me from the airport-- I’m coming home early.
What? I don’t get it. You were having such a good time!
I know! And now the weekend’s ruined. So I’m coming home.

Lis? Take it from me... We’re lucky if we get one really good friend in this lifetime. You have three. On Lisa contemplating her mother’s words.  95 96 97 98 99 Official White 6-15-16 103. INT. THE RITZ CARLTON - GIRL’S SUITE BAR AREA - DAY 95 Ryan gets dressed for the keynote speech, trying to keep together. The TV’s on in the background.

Hot Topics! So this picture of Stewart Pierce slobbing down this Instagram skank has me floored! Who’da thought there was trouble in paradise? Poor Ryan, right? Ryan snatches up the remote, pressing a button. The screensaver comes on. Past Essence Fest photos of the gir pop up on screen. Pictures of them in much happier times. Ryan watches for a beat, then powers it off.
Sasha stares at her laptop screen.
...-Honestly, I don’t know how Ryan’s gonna survive this. Especially as a quote-unquote relationship expert. Sasha turns it off. Andra Day’s “Rise Up” plays as we see a MONTAGE OF THE GI
Lisa watches GROUPS OF FRIENDS laughing and pass her. She sobs and drowns her sorrows by eating BEIGNETS. Finally, pulls out her phone. Texts Dina: “Where are you?”
Ryan and Stewart meet in the elevator, staring straight ahead, no words. Ryan tries to keep her head high.
Lisa enters, sees Dina sitting at the bar sharing a pitch of beer with the Hobo.
Now I know you’re as upset as I am.  100 101 102 Official White 6-15-16 104.
I know y'all probably only keep me around for laughs, but I love you bitches and would die for each one of you. Lisa tears up.
I know you would and that’s why we keep you around. You’re the most fiercely loyal friend we'll ever know and we're lucky to have you. Laughs or not. They hug.
We need to go see Ry’s speech. She's hurting right now and she needs us.
Let’s go --
And guess what we’re wearing?
Sasha records a video for her blog.
This morning I decided I no longer want to be part of a process that tears people down in order to profit.
Ryan looks flawless despite everything. She rides in sile next to Stewart, who looks equally stylish. The limo stops. Ryan puts her game face on, then exits.
Ryan flashes her million dollar smile to the crowd like a as REPORTERS and PAPARAZZI surround her and Stewart.  103 104 105 Official White 6-15-16 105.
Ryan, is it true that you’ve already filed for divorce?
Stewart, how many mistresses do you have? Ryan and Stewart, hand in hand, walk through, poised.

Lisa and Dina’s phones PING. They stop to listen to Sasha video post. INT. ESSENCE VENUE - DRESSING ROOM —- DAY 104 Alone, Ryan stares at herself in the mirror, misty-eyed, repeating her mantra for strength. At her lowest point.

I am strong, I am powerful, I am beautiful... She sees a bottle of champagne with a card from Bethany t reads “Congratulations to the woman who ‘has it all’!” Ryan’s phone BUZZES. She picks it up, sees Sasha’s tagged in a post. Ryan listens.
Effective immediately, “Sasha's Secrets” is no more.

Sasha crosses the lobby with her bags in town, a plain ou * not trying to floss- and what’s left of her dignity. As * rounds the corner -- Sasha looks up, surprised. Lisa an Dina walks toward her. Wearing their Flossy Posse vests t Lisa made.
So you was going to drop the mic on your blog and jet?
Though it might’ve been best that way.  Official White 6-15-16 106.
(hugging her) You thought wrong.
Look, y’all. I know it might be hard to believe, but I didn’t do it.
We know. She hands Sasha her Flossy Posse vest.
I just want to go back to the way things were...

Shit, we all do! You find me a time machine where we can all live in the same dorm eating Top Ramen and Mad Dog 20/20 for dinner, I’m there... But we’re grown-ass women now and we got to make this shit work, so buckle up, bitch. We’re not letting you out.
(putting on the vest) Damn! Look at you! All giving pep talks -- Lisa looks at her watch.
Shit! Ryan’s speech. We gotta move! It starts in twenty minutes!
Elizabeth walks Ryan and Stewart through the plan.

Here’s our strategy: deny, deny, deny. It’s a doctored photo. We could spin it as a TMZ/National Enquirer hoax. Say you refused an interview and they were being vindictive. Bottom line, they’re assholes, you’re golden. Ryan nods, breathes in, trying to pull herself together.  107 108 109 Official White 6-15-16 107.
Gridlock. Cars are honking. Drivers yelling. Horses crapp The ladies survey the traffic, panicking.
We're not going to make it! Sasha pulls cash from her wallet and hands it to the driv
Yes, we are. We’re just going to have to do it on foot.
I’m not running in this heat.
Dina, let’s go! Dina sighs, then climbs out, pissed.
The ladies run. Pooping out after two blocks.
(breathless) Fuck, we're old. They see NEW ORLEANS’ signature mode of transpo: A PEDI-B riding by.
Hey! Wait up!
Sasha and Lisa in the canopy. We reveal Dina straddling t driver's lap as he looks over her shoulder to navigate.
Step on it, man! Stop bullshitting! He pumps his legs harder.
Yes, yasssss. Slower, baby. Slower.  Official White 6-15-16 108.
Every seat is filled. Julian sits down in the back. Ryan Stewart walk out hand in hand. Ryan surveys the crowd for girls. They’re not there. Ryan sighs, disappointed, as Stewart walks on stage.
The pedicab weaves in and out traffic as the ladies draw nearer to the convention center.
They climb out the cab and run through throngs of people push inside.
A very composed Stewart begins speaking into the mic.

It’s my honor and privilege to introduce this year’s Essence Keynote Speaker. Together, we've weathered many storms and overcome some of the toughest challenges. (then) Please welcome my rock, the woman I’m proud to call my wife... Ryan Pierce! The crowd cheers as Ryan walks on stage. Stewart plants a kiss on her cheek, then takes a seat.

Thank you, Stew, for that wonderful introduction. Thank you Essence for the honor of speaking today. And last but not least, thank you all for coming out to support me... Ryan reads Elizabeth’s prepared statement from a Teleprompter.
As most of you know, there’ve been many questions about the status of my marriage. And I'd like to put those rumors to rest... The picture that surfaced this morning isn’t (MORE )
114 Official White 6-15-16 109.
real. All allegations of infidelity are false. My husband and I are in a loving, faithful marriage.
The ladies, sweaty and out of breath, run down the hall. Sasha spots the main auditorium doors. They’re closed.
Oh no, it’s already started... Dina reaches for the handle. A VOLUNTEER halts them.
Sorry, ladies. No late entries. Lisa and Sasha look to Dina, knowingly.
With a loud BANG the back doors open abruptly as Dina kic them in, the ladies tumble inside, causing a scene.
I’m calling security! I said step back, fool! Ryan stops. EVERYONE turns and looks toward the commotion Dina straightens her clothing. Lisa smiles politely.
Please... Continue. Ryan smiles, taking in the sight of her girls. She looks the audience, sees VARIOUS WOMEN she’s encountered over t weekend. Women who look up to her. Ryan tries to continue
In fact, my husband and I are stronger than ever... Ryan pauses for a long beat. Her emotions catching up.
(sotto) Come on, Ry... The crowd waits. Ryan wrestles with her conscience. Then looks at her girls, her support system, the Flossy Posse.  Official White 6-15-16 110.

My agent wrote a very convincing statement for me to read to you. And I really thought I could go through with it... because I’ve done a really great job of pretending so many times before. But sometimes you reach a point when you just can’t anymore. And I can’t. I’m tired of all the lies... Stewart looks nervous as hell. He stands, trying to stop
Ry, let’s take a minute here--
Stewart, sit down. Please.
Ryan, baby. Be careful--

Sit your ass down. Now. (to the audience) The picture is real. My husband is having an affair. When I found out, I felt a lot of things: Anger. Heartache. Betrayal. But mostly, fear. Fear that my marriage was ending and that I would be alone. And I was terrified of that... So terrified I was willing to stay with someone who betrayed my trust. So terrified I was willing to accept being treated as less than I am... Stewart hangs his head. Humiliated. People are shocked.

And I know that I’m not alone in this. I know a lot of us stay in bad relationships because we've convinced ourselves that being disrespected is better than being alone. But we shouldn’t fear being alone. Because there’s power in re- discovering our own voice. Julian, in the audience, smiles.  Official White 6-15-16 111.
And I'd forgotten that. I forgot that years before I was Stewart’s wife, I was Ryan. A woman with her own ambitions. Her own dreams. She makes eye contact with Sasha, Lisa and Dina.
But luckily, my girls reminded me of that... reminded me of my own worth. And that there was a time when I didn’t fear anything. Their eyes well with pride.
No one has the power to shatter your dreams unless you give it to them. And I refuse to give anyone that power again. Ryan looks out at her fans in the crowd.

If anything, I hope that me revealing my truth inspires you to realize your own. Thank you for listening. Ryan makes a swift exit, fighting off tears. As the door closes, an ERUPTION OF APPLAUSE. Stewart sits there, stun
All three ladies rush in. Ryan looks at them, says genuin
I’m so sorry, I didn’t mean any of what I said earlier. I was just--
We know. We’re so proud of you, Ry. That was beautiful... Really brave.
(fighting back tears) You my nigga for real. Sasha hangs back, tries to find the right words.  Official White 6-15-16 112.
Ryan, I would never hurt you, you have to --
I believe you. Sasha smiles, breathes a huge sigh of relief.
Yes! Now hug it out! Sasha rolls her eyes at Lisa, then pulls Ryan into a hug. Then Elizabeth walks in. Ryan looks at her apologetically
Liz, don’t hate me, I--
Bethany still wants to do the deal--
But how--
With just you. Ryan takes this in, stunned.
Turns out single women are an even bigger market.
Seriously?! Ecstatic, Ryan hugs Elizabeth.
Well y'all know what that means... it’s a celebration, bitches! Dina pops the champagne bottle. The ladies all cheer.
The ladies watch Mariah Carey sing “Fly Like a Bird.” Swa to the music. Having fun.
You okay? Ryan shakes her head. Decides to keep it real.  Official White 6-15-16 113.
Not yet. But I will be. Sasha whips out her selfie stick.
Selfie time!
This bitch... The ladies all gather and pose for an iconic selfie. A FR FRAME captures it and dates it 2017. On Ryan, finding strength in this moment with her girls.
In the end, I had to redefine what “having it all” really means...
Tamron Hall sits across from Ryan, mid-interview.
...so often, we’ve used that phrase to describe a woman who has a relationship and a successful career. I used to define it that way, too, but I’ve since evolved.
What does it mean to you now?
Having it all means having people in your life who elevate you. INT. LISA’S HOUSE - DAY 119 Lisa is on a date. Confidence restored.
Friends who are nurturing... Lisa gets a call from her kids and we see the wallpaper o her phone is the photo of our ladies at Essence Fest.  120 121 122 Official White 6-15-16 114.
Club PATRONS laugh, drink and have a good time. Dina walk around, checking on the CIROC GIRLS. Running the show. Sh sees Diddy across the club and gives him a nod.

...who are fearless. Dina pulls out her Essence Fest Photo on her smart phone admires it. INT. RYAN AND SASHA’S OFFICE - DAY 121 Empty office. Boxes everywhere. Sasha hangs up a framed, blown up VARIETY article that reads: “OWN picks up Ryan Pierce and Sasha Franklin’s Women’s Empowerment series.”
...who share your goal to contribute to the world... Sasha sets the Essence Fest photo prominently on her desk
Ryan sits, thoughtful and introspective.
..-Having it all means surrounding yourself with people who love and support you. And who won’t let you be afraid to go after the life you want.
Well put. But I do have to ask, now that the divorce is final, are you dating anyone special?

I learned my lesson the first time-- I’m not talking about my love life! I will say this though, I’m the happiest I’ve been in a long time. She gives a genuine smile as we CUT TO: In the Convention Center Audience we see Julian waits all smiles.  123 124 Official White 6-15-16 115.
Ryan approaches Julian standing with Sasha, Dina and Lisa
So... how was I?
You’re still the shit. He kisses her as Lisa, Sasha and Dina walk up together.
There she is!/Bring it in, girl/You one brilliant bitch! As they hug, we know the Flossy Posse will always ride. FADE OUT.
The Pinettes, an all-female brass band leads a second lin march and our ladies down Bourbon Street as they play a b band version of I’m Every Woman
